column4: hi can someone confirm that i have the following correct? i have an EPIA-M m/board with an SST39SF020A bios chip, along with an RD1-PL 2Mbit bios savour, are these both 2Mb chips? i have tried writing the RD! with a image file, but it always fails :( anyone any pointers?
wrong channel really, try #hardware you may be luckier
however, just use the chip name to search in Google, it is highly selective.
